name: Battle-feel 3 Global Military Nations: Abomination Army Clash in Mayhem War
name_original: Battle-feel 3 Global Military Nations: Abomination Army Clash in Mayhem War
description:
Step in the boots of a deadly soldier. Your mission is simple; take out as much enemy contact as possible before the mission timer runs out!

* Look out for special soldiers!
* Retro arcade shooter!
* Real-Time Multiplayer Mode!
* Crisp graphics!
